title: Alfa Romeo 4C Spider -- TEST/DRIVE
description: This season, The Drive brought 11 of today's best performance cars to Mendocino National Forest, CA for a group test and quick reviews. With contributors A.J. Baime, Matt Farah, Mike Guy, Mike Spinelli and Lawrence Ulrich. This week, It's the raucous Alfa Romeo 4C Spyder.
tags: Alfa Romeo 4C Sypder, Alfa, Alfa Romeo car review, Test/Drive

asset.title: Alfa Romeo 4C Spider -- TEST/DRIVE
asset.description:
This season, The Drive brought 11 of today's best performance cars to Mendocino National Forest, CA for a group test and quick reviews. With contributors A.J. Baime, Matt Farah, Mike Guy, Mike Spinelli and Lawrence Ulrich. This week, It's the raucous Alfa Romeo 4C Spyder.

More at The Drive:
